snippet.title: Reverse Problem | Official Gameplay Trailer | Releasing In Spring 2025
snippet.description:
➤Wishlist on STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3355020/Reverse_Problem
➤Tag Axle Games Website: https://www.tagaxlegames.com/

In the Reverse Problem, you'll face 200 handcrafted truck maneuvering challenges across small islands. You’ll get to drive 100 unique trucks and buses. For an added challenge, you can create your own levels in Sandbox mode, or test your endurance with two different endless modes.

#pcgaming #trailer #gameplay #reverseproblem #indiegame
